name: Yiddish Vaudeville, Burlesque, and Drag workshop with Goldie Luxemburg
description:
Come see a fabulous performance and presentation on the history of Yiddish vaudeville and its enormous influence on today's comedy, burlesque and drag. Stay for the burlesque dance class with a Yiddishe twist!

Goldie Luxemburg drags burlesque back to its roots in vaudeville, music halls, and girlie shows. Armed with a quick wit, a soaring voice, and a baritone ukulele, she's Southern Ontario's Yenta of Burlesque.

name: Comedy X Storytelling: Listen to This!
description:
Featuring some of the city's most talented storytellers and comedians.

This month, our performers will all be telling true stories about their worst gifts, as both givers and recipients.

Come celebrate the holiday season with us as we delight in stories of accidentally offensive presents, misplaced best intentions, and awkward family interactions.
